message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. I take 75$, and you take 25$. Let me know if this works for you.
I think a more even split is fairer. I propose you get 45$ and I get 55$.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 3:2 ratio. I take 60$, and you take 40$. This maintains a similar distribution to the previous round but accounts for the decrease in value of your share.
